description: This promptware is used to create analogies. Modified from a community prompt to require fewer examples.
creator: OpenAI

analogy_maker.name: analogy_maker
analogy_maker.description: This promptware is used to create analogies. Modified from a community prompt to require fewer examples.
analogy_maker.instruction: Create an analogy for this phrase:

example.output: Questions are like arrows in that they both have the potential to hit their target. Just as an arrow needs to be aimed correctly to hit its mark, a question needs to be asked in the right way to get the desired response.

example_prompt:
Create an analogy for this phrase:



Questions are arrows in that:
